H0.text: Where was the first British Grand Prix motor race held. Brooklands

H1.text: Where was the first British Grand Prix motor race held. Donington Park

H2.text: Where was the first British Grand Prix motor race held. Silverstone

H3.text: Where was the first British Grand Prix motor race held. EGLB

A4.text: This first British Grand Prix was won by Louis Wagner and Robert Sénéchal, sharing the drive in a Delage 155B.

A5.text: Grand Prix motor racing was established at Brooklands in 1926 by Henry Segrave
